84 FIELDIANA: GEOLOGY, VOLUME 35 

Silliman's Fossil Mount, Frobisher Bay, Baffin Land, Canada. Collec- 
 ted by S. K. Roy, Rawson-MacMillan Expedition, 1927-1928. 

Hormotoma cylindricum Wing, 1925 nomen nudum 
 Referred specimens: two specimens UC 21860 
 Wing, 1925, p. 312 

Middle Silurian, Late Wenlock-Ludlow, Racine Dolomite. 
 Bridgeport Quarry, Chicago, Cook County, Illinois. Van Home Col- 
 lection. 

Referred specimen: UC 28762 

Wing, 1925, p. 312 
 Middle Silurian, Late Wenlock-Ludlow, Racine Dolomite. 

Stony Island Quarry, Chicago, Cook County, Illinois. Collected by 
 M. E. Wing. 

Remarks: Hormotoma = Murchisonia (Hormotoma) 
 Knight etal., 1960, p. 1291 

Hormotoma desiderata (Hall, 1862)

Hormotoma fasciata Branson, 1909 
 Holotype: not designated, to be selected from two specimens UC 
 11509 
 Branson, 1909, p. 45, pi. 7, fig. 16 
 Middle Ordovician, Stones River Group, Auburn Chert. 
 Near Auburn, Lincoln County, Missouri. Collected by Stuart Weller, 

1896. 
 Remarks: Hormotoma = Murchisonia (Hormotoma) 
 Knight etal., 1960, p. 1291 

Hormotoma gracilis var. angustata (Hall, 1847) 
 Referred specimens: three specimens, UC 5907 

Bradley, 1925, p. 57 
 Middle Ordovician, Kimmswick Limestone 

Glencoe Lime Company, Glen Park, Missouri. (Published) Near 
 Sulpher (sic) Springs Mo. 3B. (UC Catalogue) Collected by 
 Stuart Weller, 1896. 
 Remarks: Hormotoma = Murchisonia (Hormotoma)
